00034 // custom validators for numbers that optionally ends with kKmMgG
00035 namespace boost { namespace program_options {
00036 
00037 typedef std::vector<std::string> Strings;
00038 
00039 void validate(boost::any &v, const Strings &values, int64_t *, int) {
00040   validators::check_first_occurrence(v);
00041   const std::string &s = validators::get_single_string(values);
00042   char *last;
00043   int64_t result = strtoll(s.c_str(), &last, 0);
00044 
00045   if (s.c_str() == last)
00046     HT_THROWF(Error::CONFIG_BAD_VALUE, "invalid number: '%s'", last);
00047 
00048   switch (*last) {
00049     case 'k':
00050     case 'K': result *= 1000LL;         break;
00051     case 'm':
00052     case 'M': result *= 1000000LL;      break;
00053     case 'g':
00054     case 'G': result *= 1000000000LL;   break;
00055     case '\0':                          break;
00056     default: HT_THROWF(Error::CONFIG_BAD_VALUE,
00057                        "invalid number suffix: '%s'", last);
00058   }
00059   v = any(result);
00060 }
00061 
00062 void validate(boost::any &v, const Strings &values, int32_t *, int) {
00063   validate(v, values, (int64_t *)0, 0);
00064   int64_t res = any_cast<int64_t>(v);
00065 
00066   if (res > INT32_MAX || res < INT32_MIN)
00067     throw validation_error("number out of range of 32-bit integer");
00068 
00069   v = any((int32_t)res);
00070 }
00071 
00072 void validate(boost::any &v, const Strings &values, uint16_t *, int) {
00073   validate(v, values, (int64_t *)0, 0);
00074   int64_t res = any_cast<int64_t>(v);
00075 
00076   if (res > UINT16_MAX)
00077     throw validation_error("number out of range of 16-bit integer");
00078 
00079   v = any((uint16_t)res);
00080 }

00085 namespace {
00086 
00087 void
00088 parse(command_line_parser &parser, const PropertiesDesc &desc,
00089       variables_map &result, const PropertiesDesc *hidden,
00090       const PositionalDesc *p) {
00091   try {
00092     Desc full(desc);
00093 
00094     if (hidden)
00095       full.add(*hidden);
00096 
00097     parser.options(full);
00098 
00099     if (p)
00100       parser.positional(*p);
00101 
00102     store(parser.run(), result);
00103     notify(result);
00104   }
00105   catch (std::exception &e) {
00106     HT_THROW(Error::CONFIG_BAD_ARGUMENT, e.what());
00107   }
00108 }
00109 
00110 } // local namespace

00113 void
00114 Properties::load(const String &fname, const PropertiesDesc &desc,
00115                  bool allow_unregistered) {
00116   m_need_alias_sync = true;
00117 
00118   try {
00119     std::ifstream in(fname.c_str());
00120 
00121     if (!in)
00122       HT_THROWF(Error::CONFIG_BAD_CFG_FILE, "%s", strerror(errno));
00123 
00124 #if BOOST_VERSION >= 103500
00125     store(parse_config_file(in, desc, allow_unregistered), m_map);
00126 #else
00127     store(parse_config_file(in, desc), m_map);
00128 #endif
00129   }
00130   catch (std::exception &e) {
00131     HT_THROWF(Error::CONFIG_BAD_CFG_FILE, "%s: %s", fname.c_str(), e.what());
00132   }
00133 }
00134 
00135 void
00136 Properties::parse_args(int argc, char *argv[], const PropertiesDesc &desc,
00137                        const PropertiesDesc *hidden, const PositionalDesc *p) {
00138   // command_line_parser can't seem to handle argc = 0
00139   const char *dummy = "_";
00140 
00141   if (argc < 1) {
00142     argc = 1;
00143     argv = (char **)&dummy;
00144   }
00145   HT_TRY("parsing arguments",
00146     command_line_parser parser(argc, argv);
00147     parse(parser, desc, m_map, hidden, p));
00148 }
00149 
00150 void
00151 Properties::parse_args(const std::vector<String> &args,
00152                        const PropertiesDesc &desc, const PropertiesDesc *hidden,
00153                        const PositionalDesc *p) {
00154   HT_TRY("parsing arguments",
00155     command_line_parser parser(args);
00156     parse(parser, desc, m_map, hidden, p));
00157 }

00159 void Properties::alias(const String &primary, const String &secondary,
00160                        bool overwrite) {
00161   if (overwrite)
00162     m_alias_map[primary] = secondary;
00163   else
00164     m_alias_map.insert(std::make_pair(primary, secondary));
00165 
00166   m_need_alias_sync = true;
00167 }
00168 
00169 void Properties::sync_aliases() {
00170   if (!m_need_alias_sync)
00171     return;
00172 
00173   foreach(const AliasMap::value_type &v, m_alias_map) {
00174     Map::iterator it1 = m_map.find(v.first);
00175     Map::iterator it2 = m_map.find(v.second);
00176 
00177     if (it1 != m_map.end()) {
00178       if (it2 == m_map.end())
00179         m_map.insert(std::make_pair(v.second, (*it1).second));
00180       else if (!(*it1).second.defaulted())
00181         (*it2).second = (*it1).second;  // command line trumps
00182       else if (!(*it2).second.defaulted())
00183         (*it1).second = (*it2).second;  // copy config value
00184     }
00185     else if (it2 != m_map.end()) {
00186       m_map.insert(std::make_pair(v.first, (*it2).second)); // copy
00187     }
00188   }
00189   m_need_alias_sync = false;
00190 }

00192 // need to be updated when adding new option type
00193 String Properties::to_str(const boost::any &v) {
00194   if (v.type() == typeid(String))
00195     return boost::any_cast<String>(v);
00196 
00197   if (v.type() == typeid(uint16_t))
00198     return format("%u", (unsigned)boost::any_cast<uint16_t>(v));
00199 
00200   if (v.type() == typeid(int32_t))
00201     return format("%d", boost::any_cast<int32_t>(v));
00202 
00203   if (v.type() == typeid(int64_t))
00204     return format("%llu", (Llu)boost::any_cast<int64_t>(v));
00205 
00206   if (v.type() == typeid(bool)) {
00207     bool bval = boost::any_cast<bool>(v);
00208     return bval ? "true" : "false";
00209   }
00210   return format("value of type '%s'", v.type().name());
00211 }
00212 
00213 void
00214 Properties::print(std::ostream &out, bool include_default) {
00215   foreach(const Map::value_type &kv, m_map) {
00216     bool isdefault = kv.second.defaulted();
00217 
00218     if (include_default || !isdefault) {
00219       out << kv.first <<'='<< to_str(kv.second.value());
00220 
00221       if (isdefault)
00222         out <<" (default)";
00223 
00224       out << std::endl;
00225     }
00226   }
00227 }
